strapiEvent.name: Bike-In Cinema At The Ledger
strapiEvent.description:
Peddle up to the sixth-floor outdoor patio of the Ledger for a special Bike-In Cinema experience this summer on Jul 18 and Aug 8 at 7p!

  • Built to ride: The world's first bikeable building, the Ledger features six stories of switchbacks along the copper exterior of its 230,000ft2 mixed-use space, which includes private offices, coworking space, retail, and art displays.
  • Honey & Jam: The Bike-In Cinema series will show Bee Movie on Jul 18 and Space Jam on Aug 8. Doors open at 6:30p, and movies begin at 7p. Don't forget your blankets and snacks! Concessions will be available for purchase.

Tickets are $8 a piece or $5 when you buy more than four. Reserve your spot HERE.
